title: My client keeps disappearing
body: It's not a crash. It just boop, goes away. I could be in lobby waiting for the queue timer and boop client disappears and I have to relog into league. The worst is when my client disappears in draft champion select. I'm waiting for my turn to lock in and boop it disappears and I get punished for "dodging". Another situation would be when I'm waiting for the score screen to load up and it disappears before I get a chance to honor anyone.  I haven't found a pattern to when it disappears but it's usually after the clients been open for a while. Min 10 minutes never less. I've searched through dozens of forums and didn't find anything like my problem. I did see somewhere I forgot where to change my internet time sync or whatever it is and I did. I've changed it to all the options it gives me and restart my computer after but it never does anything. I did notice that this problem arose after I updated my Windows. I've been coping with this problem for a while now but I can't take this anymore.

replies.body: its still doing it but not as often. please help
Hmmmm.....it almost sounds like your pc is closing out the client or it's crashing entirely. Do you ever actually see any kind of error messages at all?
Nope! no error message at all. just disappears and i end up on google chrome if its opened (its not most of the time because of my ping issue) ormy windows home screen.

Scratch the draft situation being the worst.the worst is when im patching and it disappears mid patch so i have to redo it over and over again. after a lot of tries itl stay open long enough for it to finish but its still so frustrating.

Straaaaaaange. Let's try running a quick repair through the client options if you haven't yet. While you're at it, go ahead and reconfigure your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) just in case something in there was reset after that windows update.

i've done the repair thing in client and have downloaded the blitzcrank thingy and ran it. nothing has worked for me. i have ran the game as an administrator and have uninstalled league completely as an administrator through my uninstaller and through the blitzcrank repair thing.
